name: wmt-web
description: The frontend of the workload measurement tool

scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p app/public/javascripts/vendor/ && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js app/public/javascripts/vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net/js/dataTables.min.js app/public/javascripts/vendor/jquery.dataTables.min.js && cp node_modules/datatables.net-dt/css/dataTables.dataTables.min.css app/public/stylesheets && cp node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/govuk-frontend.min.js app/public/javascripts/govuk-frontend.min.js && cp node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/govuk-frontend.min.js.map app/public/javascripts/govuk-frontend.min.js.map && cp node_modules/@ministryofjustice/frontend/moj/all.js app/public/javascripts/moj.js && cp node_modules/@ministryofjustice/frontend/moj/all.js app/public/javascripts/moj.js && cp -a app/assets/javascripts/. app/public/javascripts/ && cp node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/govuk-frontend.min.css app/public/stylesheets && cp node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/govuk-frontend.min.css.map app/public/stylesheets && cp -r node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/assets/. app/public/ && cp -a app/assets/images/. app/public/images/
scripts.build: npm run compile-sass && npm run copy-assets
scripts.integration-test-generate-report: export $(cat feature.env) && npm run build && mocha --recursive test/integration --timeout=60000 --exit --reporter mocha-simple-html-reporter --reporter-options output=test_results/integration-test-reports.html
scripts.integration-test: export $(cat feature.env) && npm run build && mocha --recursive test/integration --timeout=60000 --exit
scripts.test-e2e: export $(cat feature.env) && npm run clean-dev-data && npm run seed-dev-data && wdio test/e2e.conf.js && npm run clean-dev-data
scripts.watch-views: nodemon --watch app/views -e html,njk -x npm run njk-view
scripts.watch-njk-dev: nodemon --watch njk_dev --ignore njk_dev/output -e html,js -x npm run njk-view
scripts.njk-dev: npm run njk-view && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Views,TypeScript,Node,Sass" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold,blue.bold" "npm run watch-views" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-njk-dev"
scripts.post-wiremock-mappings: for file in test/e2e/resources/wiremock/mappings/*.json; do curl --request POST --url http://localhost:8099/__admin/mappings --header 'content-type: application/json' --data-binary @$file; done
